docs.snippet: Ruffles ripple gently around the neck or whip flirtatiously around the knees. Wide, flaring skirts are back, mated to small, snug waistlines, often sashed in satin. They alternate with columnar shapes that slither over the body, minimizing bumps t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ruffles ripple gently around the neck or whip flirtatiously around the knees. Wide, flaring skirts are back, mated to small, snug waistlines, often sashed in satin. They alternate with columnar shapes that slither over the body, minimizing bumps that shouldn't be there.

headline.main: Summer's Dresses Are Frilly, Demure and Mildly Flirtatious; Ruffles Around the Neck

docs.snippet: NEWARK, Feb. 21 (AP)--A United States Customs Service employee pleaded guilty today to charges that he smuggled liquor from a warehouse on orders from a New Jersey Customs official and conspired with seven others to defraud the Government....
docs.lead_paragraph: NEWARK, Feb. 21 (AP)--A United States Customs Service employee pleaded guilty today to charges that he smuggled liquor from a warehouse on orders from a New Jersey Customs official and conspired with seven others to defraud the Government.
docs.abstract: Theodore Simmons is 5th Customs official to plead guilty to charges stemming from probe of alleged fraud, bribery and smuggling from Customs facilities in Newark area; admits to smuggling liquor from warehouse and giving it to his superior, George Davis, who has already pleaded guilty to obstruction of justice (S)

headline.main: Customs Aide Guilty Of Smuggling Liquor From U.S. Warehouse; Focus on Jersey
